title: Netflix Tanks and Mike Tyson Tokes | Daily Best of April 20 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Netflix shares plunge as the company announces a decline in subscriptions for the first time in a decade. Mike Tyson celebrates "4/20" by going on Joe Rogan's podcast, smoking weed, then claiming rich people hunt the homeless for sport. Biden and his administration flip and flop and flip and flop on the recent changes to airline mask mandates. Shaq admits he is the reason his marriage fell apart and shows that the material things of Earth will never fully satisfy. Helms celebrates his son and daughter winning the Alabama 7A Tennis State Championship. And Speedy and Greg compete in a tire change challenge as we gear up for The Honda IndyCar Grand Prix coming to Birmingham.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Rick and Bubba Show
